title: RBI Grade B - FM - FLM4 - Descriptive

quiz.text:
Ques.1) What do you mean by ethics? Discuss, why ethical issues occur in Business?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.1) “Management process is considered to consist of certain functions”. Elaborate and list these functions in a logical order
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.2) How Organizational Change differs from Organizational Development?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.2) The Reserve Bank has over the years encouraged greater use of electronic payments. In view of the above statement, discuss the initiatives taken by RBI to promote electronic payments.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]

Ques.3) What are mutual funds? What are the advantages and disadvantages of mutual funds?
[Marks: 10, Word Limit: 400, Difficulty Level: Easy]

Ques.3) What do you mean by Corporate Governance? Discuss the challenges to the Corporate Governance in Banking Sector in India.
[Marks: 15, Word Limit: 600, Difficulty Level: Moderate]
